# range

**Instance Property**

The range in the media query’s items or collections array that the media query section represents.

## Declaration

```swift
var range: NSRange { get }
```

## Working with media query sections

- **title**: The localized title of the media query section.

items.description: The localized title of the media query section.
items.name: title

title: range
